subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Sunderland striker Jozy Altidore has been ruled fit and will be with the U.S. national team for two coming World Cup qualifying matches.
snippet: Sunderland striker Jozy Altidore has been ruled fit and will be with the U.S. national team for two coming World Cup qualifying matches.
